name: Raydell's Dark Steam UI - Compact
description:
Inspired by Steam's pre-2014 look, this custom style repaints the majority of Steam pages to a dark grey theme.
This is the Compact version that strips the store page down to the bare essentials, removing most of the newly introduced elements such as the curators, the recommendations, the queue, the recently updated, the new on Steam and the endlessly scrolling bottom. It applies to the front page, the game pages, the forums, the workshop, the community hubs and the achievement pages.
additional_info:
Changelog:

V2.1.5 - 2018.09.07. - Removed most of the new sections appearing on the store (such as the recommended developers, popular VR games, etc). Left the streaming section in place for now as it seems somewhat interesting and it's also out of the way near the bottom.

V2.1.4 - 2018.03.09. - Fixed a slowdown when viewing workshop images. Recolored the new wishlist and the marked answers on the forums. Tweaked positioning of the store on lower resolution displays and with large ads at the top.

V2.1.3 - 2017.11.17. - Small tweaks and updates to bring the style to the current standard of the client skin.

V2.1.2 - 2016.11.23. - Various fixes to lower resolution displays and some positioning issues when the store has a large special ad on top.

V2.1.0 - 2016.11.20. - Moved the Special Offers (daily deal, etc) into a column on the right. This change only affects resolutions at or above 1440x900. The store is now also better centered. Some additional color fixes.

V2.0.1 - 2016.11.10. - Various minor bug fixes.

V2.0.0 - 2016.11.08. - First-response update making the skin compatible with Steam's latest large store page overhaul.

V1.6.4 - 2016.09.23. - Adjusted the background color of the new review filter box to fit the skin's theme. Changed the font color of positive ratings to green.

V1.6.3 - 2016.04.15. - Fixed store background going blue during announcements and special sales.

V1.6.2 - 2015.07.16. - Removed the Steam Hardware advertisement from the store, added toggle effects to the Greenlight vote buttons.

V1.6.1 - 2015.07.15. - Fixed/reverted several forum related changes which came with yet another minor Steam update.

V1.6.0 - 2015.07.08. - Forum icon and color fixes in response to a new Steam update.

V1.5.0 - 2015.06.06. - Client skin related update.

V1.4.0 - 2015.06.01. - Fixed front page lag caused by the removal of scrolling recommendations. Made various other small improvements to the code.

V1.3.0 - 2015.01.14. - Added gradient background, recolored some buttons and page elements for greater consistency.

V1.2.0 - 2015.01.12. - Dark theme extended to the achievement pages in response to yet another Steam update.

V1.1.0 - 2014.10.08. - Dark theme extended to the forums and community pages which turned blue after a recent Steam update.

V1.0.0 - 2014.09.25. - The initial release. Dark theme covers the storefront and the game pages.
